Method Detail

startTimer

public static void startTimer()
Start the checksum manager timer. This sends checksum requests every intervall to the clients of the server. Note: If all clients responded, use ready() to generate a new list of files to be checked.

stopTimer

public static void stopTimer()

checkChecksum

public static void checkChecksum(java.lang.String token,
                                 java.lang.String input)
                          throws java.lang.VerifyError
Throws:
java.lang.VerifyError

calculateChecksum

public static java.lang.String calculateChecksum(java.util.List<java.lang.String> files)
Calculates the checksum of the specified files. Note: For performance reasons use the Adler32 implementation of the java Checksum interface.

Parameters:
files - List of files to be processed.
Returns:
The checksum
See Also:
Adler32, Checksum
